QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: CameraAction
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Specify whether the camera should take photos or video
QGC.MetaData.Facts.enumStrings: No change,Take photo,Take photos (time),Take photos (distance),Stop taking photos,Start recording video,Stop recording video

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: CameraPhotoIntervalDistance
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Specify the distance between each photo

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: CameraPhotoIntervalTime
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Specify the time between each photo

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: CameraMode
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Specify whether the camera should switch to Photo, Video or Survey mode
